document.full_text: italian filmmaker bernardo bertolucci, best known for his controversial film "last tango in paris," was honored by the cannes film festival on wednesday in recognition of his long career.
document.title: cannes honorary award goes to "last tango" director
lines_and_colors: italian filmmaker bernardo bertolucci, best known for his controversial film "last tango in paris," was honored by the cannes film festival on wednesday in recognition of his long career.
